name: Infernum Bound
description:
Saph and Venus are separated and must pass a trial to be together again. 
  • A very short pygame game that we made as our first python project. ♡
Gameplay:
  •  15-20 min
Controls:
  • [WASD/ARROWS] - move
  • [SPACE] - interact/use item
  • [I] - inventory
  • [MOUSE] - for one of the puzzles
  • [F11] - fullscreen (can't be toggled during cutscenes)
Credits:
  • art: yokomone
  • music: milenski
  • writing: yanshi/yokomone
  • cutscenes code: yanshi
  • gameplay code: yokomone
